vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Ammonites living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.14.21; married to Solomon (H8010);
mother of: Rehoboam (H7346)
§ Naamah = "loveliness"
n pr f
1) daughter of Lamech by his wife Zillah and sister of Tubal-cain in the days before the flood
2) the Ammonite wife of Solomon and mother of king Rehoboam of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hija de Lámec; descendiente de Caín; (b)   mujer; (c)   lugar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿瑪 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "可愛"
陰性專有名詞
1) 拉麥和洗拉的女兒, 土八該隱的妹子, 生於大洪水之前的時代{#創 4:22|}
2) 所羅們的亞捫妻子, 猶大王羅波安的母親
陰性專有名詞 地名
3) 在非利士境內屬猶大的低地的一個市鎮{#書 15:41|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拿玛 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "可爱"
阴性专有名词
1) 拉麦和洗拉的女儿, 土八该隐的妹子, 生于大洪水之前的时代{#创 4:22|}
2) 所罗们的亚扪妻子, 犹大王罗波安的母亲
阴性专有名词 地名
3) 在非利士境内属犹大的低地的一个市镇{#书 15:41|}

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Naamah = "loveliness"
n pr f loc
a town in the lowlands of Judah in Philistia

A woman living at the time before the Flood, only mentioned at Gen.4.22;
daughter of: Lamech (H3929) and Zillah (H6741);
sister of: Jabal (H2989), Jubal (H3106), Tubal-cain (H8423)
§ Naamah = "loveliness"
n pr f loc
a town in the lowlands of Judah in Philistia
